label: 御内
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: A personal retainer of the Hōjō family, the Kamakura Bakufu's dominant house.↓[北条]　[Used in contrast to とざま（外様）, which refers to non-Hōjō housemen 御家人 in the Shogun's service. 御内 is a specialised, Kamakura-period use of the more general notion of house membership.]
